overview: Some men want love and romance, while others demand monogamy. But there is a handful who know that there’s only one thing that truly matters. It’s the one thing that makes the world go ‘round... the reason why wars are fought. And it doesn’t matter if you’re a Top or a bottom. Join Marco Napoli, Dave London, Atlas Grant, Clay Towers, Dave Lee, Martin Dajnar, Dallas Steele, and Jake Morgan as they lose themselves, release steam, and unload. Men who know that to achieve peace… All We Need Is Cock.
title: All We Need Is Cock
